summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the Butterfly Trust for the period of May 1, 2019, to May 31, 2019. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest accrued, highlighting the financial activities associated with the trust during this timeframe.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact person for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The account balance for the Butterfly Trust as of May 1, 2019, was $597,828.79.
During May 2019, the account had a service charge of $50.00.
The ending balance for the Butterfly Trust as of May 31, 2019, was $21.71.
There was an outgoing money transfer to JPMorgan Chase Bank.
Interest accrued on the account during this period was $21.71.
